comments.author: Man0fKnight
comments.created_time: September 14, 2022, 06:09:28 PMLast edit: September 14, 2022, 06:20:28 PM by Man0fKnight
comments.body: Why such a large premine?If there is NO halving, there are 28800 coins mined a day...so 50 million coins is equivalent of 1736.11 days or 4.753 YEARS of mining for the entire blockchain.4 (15 second blocks) * 60 * 24 * 5 coins = 28800 daily mined give or take.  50,000,000 / 28800 = 1736.11  1736.11 / 365.25 = 4.753 YEARS worth of entire blockchain mining.If using the 20 second blocks3 * 60 * 24 * 5 coins = 21600 coins mined daily on the whole chain.  50,000,000 / 21600 = 2314.81  2314.81 / 365.25 = 6.338 YEARS worth of entire blockchain mining in premine.Are these being sold at the Dae cash site?  If so, how much of the sales are being reinvested in the coin itself?  You are valuing it at .03 each or approximately 1.5 million USD worth of coins of premine.

comments.author: Man0fKnight
comments.body: Quote from: daefrom on September 14, 2022, 05:07:20 PMQuote from: unnamed0simple on September 13, 2022, 12:56:09 PMEfromWhat is the meaning of this word?Just a word - brand (what is Nike meaning??? It is same question?) Nike was the goddess of victory...great branding for a shoe company that values winning.

comments.body: Quote from: Man0fKnight on September 14, 2022, 06:16:01 PMQuote from: daefrom on September 14, 2022, 05:07:20 PMQuote from: unnamed0simple on September 13, 2022, 12:56:09 PMEfromWhat is the meaning of this word?Just a word - brand (what is Nike meaning??? It is same question?) Nike was the goddess of victory...great branding for a shoe company that values winning.sir you are not quite right.Pre-mined doesn't mean used, so just relax. These coins will be use only as is describe on whitepaper. We are currently financing the project from our own funds, servers, listings, 2 extra people for full time work, and so on ...You are just see the pre-mined, but read the whitepaper, or roadmap, there are huge changes in blockchain, if you are able develop cheap these changes , so lets go, you are welcome. I cann`t to write how much is cost listings and others services, because we are under NDA.Your thinking is like the thinking of an envious person. That`s all what is on my heard.BTW: Yes, Vitalik premined more ETH. So there is something wrong with your calculation.

So there is something wrong with your calculation.The numbers are right and you are correct, Ethereum premined 60 million, but they also completely built the platform that you are working off of.  What are the huge changes in the blockchain that was already created for you?  I read the whitepaper, you are completely using the blockchain that was created for you.There are some red flags such as the premine numbers and such, as well as the address associated with the coin being a tiny IT shop but all the websites were associated with Philippine IP addresses.  However, I hope you succeed, we all gotta start somewhere.
